content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5)

### Coal Mining and Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors due to Full Chests
- Ensure that chests are regularly emptied to prevent mining drills from halting operations. The chest at (-14.5, -48.5) and the chest at (41.5, -80.5) are full and need to be emptied to continue mining.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors due to Insufficient Inventory Items
- Ensure that you have the necessary items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a structure. The error occurred multiple times when trying to insert iron ore into furnaces without having enough in the inventory.
